(define/contract (maximum-sum-of-heights maxHeights)
  (-> (listof exact-integer?) exact-integer?)
  
  (define (calc-sum heights peak)
    (let* ((left (if (> peak 0) (apply max (take heights (add1 peak))) 0))
           (right (if (< peak (sub1 (length heights))) (apply max (drop heights peak)) 0))
           (sum (+ left right)))
      (for/list ((i (in-range (length heights))))
        (when (and (> i 0) (< i peak))
          (set! sum (+ sum (min (list-ref heights i) (list-ref heights (sub1 i))))))
        (when (and (> i peak) (< i (sub1 (length heights))))
          (set! sum (+ sum (min (list-ref heights i) (list-ref heights (add1 i)))))))
      sum))

  (define (find-max-sum heights)
    (let loop ((i 0) (max-sum 0))
      (if (= i (length heights))
          max-sum
          (let ((current-sum (calc-sum heights i)))
            (loop (add1 i) (max max-sum current-sum))))))
  
  (find-max-sum maxHeights))
